ygData.subject: Re: suggestions to Verant
ygData.msgSnippet: ... But they ve changed the other classes already - doesn t that invalidate the balancing already?  Or are they trying to say that Wizards are the standard
ygData.messageBody:
At 04:33 PM 05/28/1999 EDT, you wrote:
>From: mprez20@...
>I for one belive in the power of the wizard and I do know that brad and
>verant have absolutely no intent of changing them. I quote "Wizards are by
>far the most balanced casting class and to change anything to them now would
>destroy 1 years worth of game balancing".
>
>Adaar
>Eruidte Wizard Welcoming all comments =)

But they've changed the other classes already - doesn't that invalidate the
"balancing" already? Or are they trying to say that Wizards are the
standard by which all other magic-using classes are judged? That would be
a very cool distinction, but lower our chances of getting the Wizard class
changed to almost nil.

-Pennaggolan, 3rd Circle Wizard of Felwithe
